subject: RE: [junit] Testing philosophy question
msgSnippet: ... Ok, so what is a test? Is a test an assertEquals() method call or is it a testXXX() method? ... Simon
messageBody:
<snip>

>> Some people would put each assertion into a separate test method.
>> This is a quasi-religious issue for some.
>
>For others, it is simply a way to count the number of tests accurately.

Ok, so what is a test? Is a test an assertEquals() method call or is it a testXXX() method?


>--
>J. B. Rainsberger,

Simon
